biotools.summary: The Analysis of Replication Timing and Organization tool uses signal processing methods to fit a constant piece-wise linear curve to the measured raw data. It takes raw time of replication (ToR) measurement signals as input and outputs for each genomic location an estimate of its ToR and an association to CTR (constant ToR region) or TTR (Temporal Transition Region).

bioschemas.name: ARTO
